attributes.action: have more referendums by mobile phone on key issues and no more than 90 MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Modernise parliament to increase democracy by allowing the public to vote on more key bills and legislation by organising a mobile phone vote.  This could be more secure than the existing voting mechanism and have MPs that focus on less and allow the people to vote on key issues

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
